questions.question: Two waves of same frequency and amplitude meet at a point where they are 180<sup>0</sup> out of phase. Which of the following is correct?

answers.a: They superimpose, resulting in zero intensity
answers.b: Their amplitudes subtract, resulting in zero amplitude
answers.d: Their energy at that point disappear and thus the energy of the waves after interference is half that of the original waves
